name: LivingSituation
title: Living Situation
description: Determination of whether the person lives alone, with family, with friends, in congregate living, etc.  (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Living Situation.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person lives alone, with family, with friends, in congregate living, etc. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Living Situation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Living Situation.)
